name: OPIUM EAU DE PARFUM
description: A mythical fragrance, symbol of extreme femininity, Opium represents a quest for the absolute on the edge of luxurious elegant eroticism. An empire for the senses, it encourages to stop time, break the rules and taboos to give free reign to mystery, dreams, and imagination. Beyond time and borders, it is a voyage to a symbolic, enigmatic and multi-faceted elsewhere. Losing oneself in its magic is a heady experience.
